source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic sunset over the Grand Canyon. Clouds move swiftly across the sky as the sun descends, casting shifting rays of light and shadows across the vast canyon landscape. The scene is dynamic, with the light and clouds constantly changing.
